column4: Hi! I have just installed ubuntu 5.04 but obviously I have missed to set root password. Can anybody help me what do I have to do? Is there any default root password if I have missed to put it?
Use sudo instead of setting the root password and logging in as root
That also got me the 1st time I installed :)
however the sudo scheme makes me stay logged in as root much more seldom and is actually "a good idea"(tm)
